tip: :w ! sudo tee %' Have you ever opened a file in vim that you don't have permissions to edit?
Check out Task::Kensho for great Perl modules
Fetch FASTA sequences using identifier from a file. 'grep -A1 -f list mainfile > fastaofidsfromlist'
Convert FASTQ to FASTA: $ cat file_in.fastq | perl -e '$i=0;while(< >){if(/^\@/&&$i==0){s/^\@/\>/;print;}elsif($i==1){print;$i=-3}$i++;}' > file_out.fasta
